body_html:
Looks like it's a path issue: tensorflow/core/lib/gif/testdata/scan.gif : The system cannot find the path specified. Curse you backslashes! I'll wrap the files with os.path.join and see if that works.

Edit: it probably isn't this, but I'll keep in the os.path as a best-practices thing (unless thats no-bono)

body:
Looks like it's a path issue: `tensorflow/core/lib/gif/testdata/scan.gif : The system cannot find the path specified.` Curse you backslashes! I'll wrap the files with `os.path.join` and see if that works.

Edit: it probably isn't this, but I'll keep in the `os.path` as a best-practices thing (unless thats no-bono)
